name: The Grims Nightmare
description:
A very spoopy game

     Find a key

                                  Find a fuse

Fix the box                             

Try not to die             

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

E - Interact

Q - Look behind

Credits

Producer : Morgan Finney

Designer: Rowan James [Sounds]

Programmer: Cypriana Przybyl [Interactions and cut scene]

Programmer: Ewan Foley [PLayers controler]

     2D Art:  Laura Lukacova [Sprites and Materials]

2D Art: Dasa Falisova [Sprites]

     2D Art: Matthew Hobbs [Sprites and Asset placement]

2D Art: Luke Horner [Sprites]

     3D Art: Matus Remenar [Assets]
